write_reason: Write A Reason For Declince or hit Confirm
subscribe_first_m: Please subscribe to our channels first:
mm_btn_1a: choose one from the following categories:
rent_t2: Choose one of the following cities:
rent_sub_city: Enter the desired area or distirict:
rent_start_date:
Enter your desired start date:
format:dd/mm/ yyyy example: [automatic_tomorrow_date]
rent_end_date:
Enter the end date you want:
format:dd/mm/ yyyy example: [automatic_tomorrow_date]
rent_contract_status: Specify the status of the contract:
rent_pricing_type: How would you like to announce the price?
rent_price:
Enter the price you want in euros:
(Just enter a number, such as: 5 or 5.50)
rent_description: Send the description of your ad:
rent_photos:
Submit as many photos as you want for your ad:
Note: Only the first photo you upload below will be placed at the top
of your ad in the channel, other photos can be viewed by clicking on
the ""view ad images "" button. Inside the ad, your ad will be visible to
the visitors .
Submit photos individually ( upload one photo at a time ).
If you upload a group of photos, your photos will not be received.
rent_photo_error: Please send photo or choose without photo
rent_photo_error2: Please send photo or choose NEXT STEP
rent_photos_done:
âœ…photo uploaded succesfully 
you can upload next photo or go to next step
rent_thank_you_msg:
Thank you for your cooperation.
Your ad has been successfully registered
Your ad was received by the robot and will be placed on the channel after
the admin's approval. Please be patient.

The ad status will be sent to you by this robot
ğŸ”´ You can start registering your next ads before the admin
approves or rejects this ad.
